data.name: Genotype
data.description:
ENORMOUS COMBAT UPDATE!

In this Metroid-inspired classic FPS adventure, you discover an abandoned lab in Antarctica overrun by monstrous beasts. You then find a set of gloves that prints living organisms usable as weapons and tools. William, the sole survivor, is in your head via radio. He appeals to your emotions. But can you trust him?

On February 8, 2024 we released an update that dramatically improves combat! Some of the changes:

üî´ 5 new radically different weaponized organisms
üí™ New upgrade system giving you more choice in how you deal with enemies
üöß Improved combat spaces to enhance your adrenaline flow
üëæ New enemies, fine-tuned behaviors, and better boss fights
üí∞ Rebalanced loot amounts and ammo costs
ü•µ Four difficulty settings
üìù Even more lore to find in the facility
‚ûï Atmospheric synth-scapes, resolution equal to PCVR, and much more.

Slay an abundance of enemies, big and small! With what‚Äôs scattered in the facility, you use their guts to upgrade your organisms and the gloves that print them.

The World is mazy and open, so backtrack and maximize exploration and looting. Morph into a tiny beetle to negotiate narrow passageways using your Brainlink creature, or rip obstacles apart with the Grubber. An epic boss battle awaits at the story‚Äôs crescendo, and a penguin will break your heart. It‚Äôs OK, just save the World.

Genotype is a beautiful Meta Quest 2 game perfectly updated for Meta Quest 3 and Oculus Rift.

changelog.change_log:
# Patch 2 changelog (24/11/23)

### Highlights:

- **Journals:** Genotype now features 80+ journals containing lore and clues to puzzles. The journals and locked crates can be found throughout the facility.
- **GRAID appearance blueprints:** These 6 GRAID appearance blueprints have been hidden in different places around the facility.
- **Achievements:** Added 21 achievements.

---

### Gameplay changes:

- Added an additional check-in console (save terminal) close to Arrival in Maintenance.
- Added a tab for selecting GRAID appearance on terminals.
- Removed the mechanic of reducing maximum health when acquiring DNA samples.
- Added new setting for changing the opacity of the player origin circle.
- Added new setting for toggling whether the player origin circle should only show when outside of the origin.
- Added a setting for controlling the speed of smooth turning.
- Added new setting for having navigation orientation follow the player‚Äôs primary hand instead of the head.
- Overhauled upgrades for the Seeker creature.

---

### Graphics updates:

- Updated the Display Room in Lobby.
- Updated the VIP room in Lobby.
- Overhauled the Ventilation room in Crew Quarters.
- Overhauled the Workshop room in Crew Quarters.
- Updated Officers‚Äô Cabins in Crew Quarters.
- Overhauled Control Room in Maintenance.
- Updated Storage in Maintenance.
- Updated Operations in Maintenance.
- Improved prop placement across many rooms in the game.
- Updated the visuals of the player origin circle.

---

### Audio updates:

- Fixed dialogs in lobby regarding tutorials and biopasses.
- Fixed some voice lines being interrupted by not-so-important voice lines.
- Updated and added music in different rooms.
- Added audio to new content.

---

### Bug fixes:

- Fixed issues relating to upgrades not working properly for the Seeker creature.
- Fixed an issue where some creatures would attempt to move into the player when attempting to attack, instead of attacking from the target distance.
- Fixed a bug relating to the player not spawning in the correct position when exiting Brain Link mode.
- Fixed a bug where the Brain Link creature would not spawn facing in the same direction as the player when using snap rotation.
- Fixed an issue that would cause an airlock door to stay locked in certain cases.
- Fixed getting stuck in the tutorial with hints disabled.
- Fixed a bug where valves would be hard to grab onto.
